tours.title: Munnar, Kerala
tours.description: Explore the tea gardens, waterfalls, and serene hills of Munnar, a perfect hill station retreat.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival and local sightseeing – Tea Museum, Blossom Park
Day 2: Visit Mattupetty Dam, Echo Point, Kundala Lake
Day 3: Eravikulam National Park and departure

tours.title: Darjeeling, West Bengal
tours.description: Known for its scenic views, toy train rides, and tea estates nestled in the Himalayas.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival and leisure walk around Mall Road
Day 2: Visit Tiger Hill, Batasia Loop, Ghoom Monastery
Day 3: Explore Rock Garden, Himalayan Mountaineering Institute
Day 4: Tea estate visit and departure

tours.title: Manali, Himachal Pradesh
tours.description: A favorite destination for snow, adventure sports, and beautiful valleys.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival and Hadimba Temple visit
Day 2: Solang Valley adventure activities
Day 3: Rohtang Pass excursion
Day 4: Manikaran and Kullu trip
Day 5: Local shopping and departure

tours.title: Ooty, Tamil Nadu
tours.description: The Queen of Hill Stations offering lakes, gardens, and mountain train rides.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival and Ooty Lake boating
Day 2: Botanical Garden, Rose Garden, Doddabetta Peak
Day 3: Nilgiri Mountain Railway ride and departure

tours.title: Goa
tours.description: Sun, sand, and sea! Goa is the perfect place for beach lovers and partygoers.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival and relax at Baga Beach
Day 2: North Goa tour – Fort Aguada, Anjuna, Vagator
Day 3: South Goa tour – Basilica of Bom Jesus, Colva Beach
Day 4: Local shopping and departure

tours.title: Shillong, Meghalaya
tours.description: Known as the 'Scotland of the East', filled with waterfalls, caves, and rich culture.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival and explore Umiam Lake
Day 2: Shillong sightseeing – Wards Lake, Don Bosco Museum
Day 3: Day trip to Cherrapunjee – Mawsmai Caves, Nohkalikai Falls
Day 4: Local market visit and departure

tours.title: Jaipur, Rajasthan
tours.description: Experience royal palaces, forts, and vibrant markets in the Pink City.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival and visit to Hawa Mahal, City Palace
Day 2: Amber Fort, Jal Mahal, Jantar Mantar
Day 3: Local shopping in Bapu Bazaar and departure

tours.title: Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh
tours.description: The spiritual heart of India with ancient temples and Ganga aarti rituals.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival, temple visits, evening Ganga Aarti at Dashashwamedh Ghat
Day 2: Morning boat ride, Sarnath visit and departure

tours.title: Andaman Islands
tours.description: Tropical paradise with pristine beaches, coral reefs, and historic sites.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival at Port Blair and visit Cellular Jail
Day 2: Havelock Island – Radhanagar Beach
Day 3: Scuba diving and leisure
Day 4: Neil Island excursion
Day 5: Ross Island and North Bay Island
Day 6: Local shopping and departure

tours.title: Leh-Ladakh
tours.description: High-altitude desert, stunning landscapes, and peaceful monasteries.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Leh and acclimatization
Day 2: Local sightseeing – Shanti Stupa, Leh Palace
Day 3: Nubra Valley via Khardung La
Day 4: Diskit Monastery and return to Leh
Day 5: Pangong Lake excursion
Day 6: Hemis and Thiksey monasteries
Day 7: Departure
